languages.text: The wearer gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies that dealt damage to the wearer this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The wearer gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage against enemies that dealt damage to the wearer this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: 当敌人对装备者造成{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}时，装备者在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内对该敌人造成的伤害提高15%。

traits.locale_text: 当敌人对装备者造成伤害时，装备者在本{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内对该敌人造成的伤害提高15%。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}

languages.text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +15% к {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урону{/g}, наносимому противникам, которые нанесли урон персонажу в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies that dealt damage to the wearer this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +15% к урону, наносимому противникам, которые нанесли урон персонажу в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}.
Персонаж получает {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +15% к урону, наносимому противникам, которые нанесли урон персонажу в этом {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунде{/g}.

languages.text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で使用者に{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与えた敵に対して、使用者は+15%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}ダメージを獲得する。
languages.original_text: The wearer gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies that dealt damage to the wearer this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}で自身ににダメージを与えた敵に対し、+15%の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}ダメージを付与。

languages.text: El portador obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +15 % al {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} contra los enemigos que le hayan infligido daño en este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El portador obtiene una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +15 % al daño contra los enemigos que le hayan infligido daño en este {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text: Der Träger erhält einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +15 % Schaden gegen Feinde, die in dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} dem Träger {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zugefügt haben.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies that dealt damage to the wearer this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Der Träger erhält einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +15 % Schaden gegen Feinde, die in dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} dem Träger Schaden zugefügt haben.

languages.text: L'utilisateur reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de dégâts de +15 % contre les ennemis qui lui ont infligé des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} au cours du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
languages.original_text: The wearer gains a +15% {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} against enemies that dealt damage to the wearer this {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

traits.locale_text: L'utilisateur reçoit un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de dégâts de +15 % contre les ennemis qui lui ont infligé des dégâts au cours du {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text: Takan kişi, o {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rauntta{/g} takan kişiye {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren düşmanlara +%15 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} hasar verir.
